text: @realDonaldTrump The true virus in the United States lives in the White House & Republican Party. COVID-19 came to our Country because of their lack of leadership. THE TRUTH HURTS! IT'S ALL ON TRUMP!!! Protests came from TRUMP. He doesn't care about America, ONLY ABOUT HIMSELF!
